body.p: Mr. Bianco: Hello, my name is Bianco,
I believe you have a room for me.
Front Desk Attendant: When did you make your reservation?
Mr. Bianco: I reserved the room by telephone yesterday.
Front Desk Attendant: Ah, yes, I have it here. A double room with bath.
Mr. Bianco: That's right. For ten days.
Front Desk Attendant: Sign the register here, please.
Mr. Bianco: Here it is. Can you provide an extra cot for our room?
Mr. Bianco: Is there an extra charge for the cot?
Mr. Bianco: Can you recommend a good restaurant?
Front Desk Attendant: The hotel serves excellent meals, and there are several caf√©s in the area.
Mr. Bianco: What hours do you serve meals?
Front Desk Attendant: Here is a list of the dining room hours.
Please remember to leave your key when you go out.
